title: Mike Murphy: A Never-Trumper Offers Advice for Democrats
description: GOP Consultant Mike Murphy joins Chuck to talk about the lessons of the 2016 election, why obstruction may not be a winning strategy for Democrats, and how data analysis hurts political consensus-building.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: GOP Consultant Mike Murphy joins Chuck to talk about the lessons of the 2016 election, why obstruction may not be a winning strategy for Democrats, and how data analysis hurts political consensus-building.
